From the brand

In the spring of 2018, with enthusiasm for digital products, a group of young people came together and found Andobil to help others enjoy Tech better.Staying curious and creative, we are always determined to combine minimalism with aesthetics to create products.Helping customers to enjoy the ultimate tech is our eternal pursuit.

【Phone’s Safe Like in an Infant Seat】This car phone holder with anti-scratched plate and soft rubber side pad design give your iPhone 13 iPhone 12 11 or Samsung 100% protection, makes your cell phones always sleep like a baby in the vent phone mount when driving. Secure air-bag design of this phone holder for car vent leaves zero scratches on your mobile phone even on bumpy roads.
【0.1s Quick Release One Hand Operation】 andobil car phone holder. More convenient and easier operation with new “Quick Release” button, comparing with other “One-hand operation” car phone mount, Andobil phone holder for car vent brings you brand new 0.1s-releasing experience. What’s more, the andobil car phone holder can withstand 300,000+ times open & close by repeated tests in Andobil laboratory.
【360° Flexible Rotation as Wish】 Best viewing angle when driving with this air vent car phone mount, it is designed with a 360° swivel ball joint, you can adjust your phone with a single hand for a horizontal, vertical, or more layout for navigating, phone talking, music listening, etc. Optimizing the perfect angle & position and offering safe driving experience.
【Wide Compatible with All Smartphones】 This andobil car cell phone holder is compatible with all cell phones from 4″ to 7″, the specially designed adjustable foot can be adjusted for different sizes and shapes, perfect for Apple iPhone 13 pro max, iPhone 13, iPhone 13, iPhone 12 pro max, iPhone 12, iPhone 12 mini, iPhone 11, X, XR, SE, 7, 6, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, S10, Note 10, Moto G, Google Pixel, Huawei P30, Nokia, Xiaomi, OnePlus, Sony, LG, etc.
【Andobil Car Phone Holder Service】 Andobil is professional in designing and always making the best car phone holder for all the car drivers, including Uber, Lyft, Truck drivers, etc. what’s more, we will provide 2-year support. If you meet any questions or hesitations before purchasing or when using, please let us know, we would like to hear your voice and solve them for you in 12 hours.


Compatible with All Cellphones in 4”-7” size:

iPhone Series Compatible with iPhone 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13, 12 Pro,12,12 Mini, iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, 8 Plus, 8, X, XS max, XS, XR, 7 Plus, 7, etc.
Samsung Series Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S22, S21 Ultra, S20, S10, S9, S8, S7 Edge, Note 20, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, etc.
LG Series Compatible with LG G8, G7 ThinQ, G6+, V50, V40 ThinQ, V30, Stylo 4, Optimus, etc.
Google Series Compatible with Google Pixel 4, 4XL, 3, 3XL, 2, 2XL, XL, Nexus 6P, 6, 7, 5X, etc.
Huawei Series Compatible with Huawei Mate 40, Mate 30 Pro, Mate 20, P40, P30, P20, etc
Oneplus Series Compatible with Oneplus 7 Pro, 6T, 6, 5T, 5, X, etc.
Other Cellphone Series Compatible with Moto G7, Z3, Nokia 7.1/ 6.1, etc.

Price: $17.99 - $12.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:56:30 UTC – Details)


Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scosche’s Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

Secure this mount onto any firm, flat and clean surface area

Does not interfere with wireless charging when using the proper MagicPlate placement

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office

Read more

So this vent phone holder could work well for you in extremely Driving environments. – Never Broke & Super Stable
[One Handed Operation & Drive without Distracting] Andobil design engineers upgraded the switch button, which not only made it easier to press it, but also made it quick to open the arm for only 0.1S. Mount or remove your phone in seconds with the patented Easy Clamp. – Easy to Use
[Easy to Adjust & Multiple Viewing Angle] This car mount for phone has a highly flexible ball-joint 360° rotation that provides infinite viewing angles. The phone car mount allows quick switching between vertically and landscape view .Position your phone at the perfect angle to enjoy a more relaxed and safer drive. – Best Driving Angle
[Adjustable Foot Design, Universal Compatibility ] – Andobil product manager designed adjustable foot of car phone holders. Avoid some cell phone power or volume button will be squeezed by the clamp arm. Meanwhile, the adjust foot improve the compatibility making this car cell phone holder fit for all smartphones. BTW, You don’t need to remove your thick case while using this phone holder car. – Big Phones & Thick Case Friendly
[Andobil Worry-Free Vouchsafing] – ANDOBIL vent phone holder for car always provide 24-month of worranty-support. – 12 hours quick response service

NOTE: NOT RECOMMENDED TO USE THE EXTRA DASHBOARD PAD FOR WINDSHIELD MOUNTING
Broad Vision: Qifutan cell phone car mount features a 16cm/6.2in aluminum long gooseneck that sends your phone much closer to you. It can be mounted on the dashboard or windshield firmly. Most importantly, you can bend it in every direction to avoid obstructing the view
Secure Steady Installation: Qifutan car mount for iphone 13/12/11 features an extra-strong vacuum suction cup with a layer of super sticky gel, a locking lever, and an anti-shake stabilizer. It sticks securely and easily on the dashboard or most flat surfaces and removes the phone car mount without leaving any nasty marks. (Note: use warm water to wash the car holder’s suction cup if the surface is dirty or it can not stick firmly, then let it air dry.)
One-Hand Operation: Press the button on the lower back of the car mobile phone holder to take out your phone, and press the back edge of the clamping arms to secure your phone with one hand. Make your operation more fluently. Fit well for the smartphone which’s the width between 4”-7”in and the most thickness
Smooth Contact: The car phone mount is padded with multiple soft silicone pads to avoid scratching your smartphone or other devices. Perfect choice for most cars, vehicle, pickup trucks, SUVs, trucks, taxis; a good assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers
Ideal Viewing Angle: The car phone mount features a 360° rotating ball joint that allows you to switch it from portrait to landscape view quickly, for getting the best viewing angle. It is favorable for navigation and sending and receiving phone calls. You can enjoy a more convenient and secure drive

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

Product Description

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

LZEODO POWER TOOL ORGANIZER

SPECIFICATIONS

Drill Organizer Rack*1

Wrench *1

Screws *12

Screws Nut *12

Screwdriver Holder *2

Expansion Nails Plug *3

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.

Product Description

【2022 Upgrade Stable Tablet Stand】 Made of Heavy duty aluminum-magnesium alloy solid cord , stiffened material, very sturdy and flexible. 30 inches (76 CM) Overall Length from bottom to top. Moreover, compared to most of the tablet stands on the market, our tablet holder is upgraded, the bottom is additionally reinforced to ensure its maximum stability. Make it strong and sturdy to protect your cellphone and tablet.
【Broad Compatibility】 VIVI MAO tablet holder has a wide range of compatibility, suitable for almost all 4.7-12.9 inch devices on the market, such as iPad mini 2 3 4 5,iPad Pro 9.7 10.5 11 12.9, iPad Air 2 3 4, Galaxy tabs, Switch, Fire HD tab , iPhone 13 /pro Max /Pro/X/11 10 8 7 6 , Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1″ 10.5″ 9.7″ 9.6″ 8″, Kindle Fire HD 7 8 10 , ect. In addition, the tablet phone is equipped with silicone pads, which will protect your device from scratch and damage.
【Reinforced Bolt Clamp Base】Reinforced and thickened base, not easy to break. Non-slip silicone pads are added to the base clip to avoid damage to your furniture. The base has a maximum clamp size of 3.7 inches, maximizing usability. Whether you’re laying in bed watching movie, viewing recipes in the kitchen,exercising in the gym, or using your devices anywhere, you don’t have to worry about falling and breaking it.
【Easy to Mount & Position】 This gooseneck clamp can be mount to many places like bed headboard, desk or table next to your favorite chair. With 360 degree rotate clip and flexble arm, It can be adjusted to your eye level or any other height you want. Free your hands when watching movies, playing games, reading, viewing recipes, recording videos, etc.
【Using Tips】1. Please loop the long arm into “S or Z “shape or circle shape helps maintain more stability . 2. The material of the holder is stronger for the heavy tablet, it will be a litte hard to bend, so please use your both hands to bend the holder when you start to use it. 3. This type of gooseneck tablet holder is perfect for reading,viewing,or recording. But when you tap on your tablet frequently , it unavoidably bounces and wobbles due to some law of physics.
